input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "PicturesOnGold"
Reference Product Name: "Custom Photo Engraved Bracelet"
Reference Product Description:
This beautiful bracelet allows for a adjustable size - to fit all wrists!
Held together by a rounded box chain, with a round photo charm attached at the center.
This new stylish bracelet is perfect for any gift or occasion.
All photos are 100% lifetime guaranteed.
Item can be engraved with message, names, dates or monogram.
Engraving doesn't delay your shipment.
Picture Engraving is scratch and water resistant and included in the price.
One Size Fits All

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='PicturesOnGold Photo Engraved Mesh Charm Jewelry Bracelet'
  - Name='Tiffany Photo Heart Expandable Bracelet'
  - Name='Zales 1/20 ct. Lab-Grown Diamond Solitaire F/Vs2 Bracelet'
  - Name='Zales 1/15 ct. T.W. Diamond Ribbed Double Row Bar Bracelet in Sterling'
  - Name='Expandable Photo Charm Bracelet'
  - Name='Zales Sterling Silver and 18K Rose Gold Diamond Solitaire Heart Bracelet'
  - Name='Zales 14K Tri-Tone Gold Diamond-Cut Puffed Heart Station Bracelet'
  - Name='Love + Be Loved Birthstone Bolo Bracelet'
  - Name='Shutterfly Engraved Cuff'
  - Name='Sterling Silver Photo Rope-Edge Bolo Bracelet'
  - Name='Personalized Photo Projection Corded Bracelet'
  - Name='Custom Photo Projection Bracelet'
  - Name='Personalized Photo Projection Bracelet'
  - Name='Custom Photo Heart Photo Projection Bracelet'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: PicturesOnGold Photo Engraved Mesh Charm Jewelry Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar product from the same brand involving photo engraving on a bracelet with charm; likely similar function and style.
Photo engraved expandable bracelet with heart shape; similar purpose but likely different style and premium brand positioning.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Zales 1/20 ct. Lab-Grown Diamond Solitaire F/Vs2 Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Diamond solitaire bracelet focused on gemstones, not photo engraving, differing in core function and styling.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Zales 1/15 ct. T.W. Diamond Ribbed Double Row Bar Bracelet in Sterling
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Diamond bar bracelet without photo engraving; primarily jewelry focused on diamonds rather than photo customization.
Expandable bracelet with photo charm; close in concept to reference product though brand/style details missing.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Zales Sterling Silver and 18K Rose Gold Diamond Solitaire Heart Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Diamond solitaire heart bracelet concentrated on precious metals and stones, not photo engraving feature.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Zales 14K Tri-Tone Gold Diamond-Cut Puffed Heart Station Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Traditional diamond-cut heart bracelet without photo engraving or similar customization features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Love + Be Loved Birthstone Bolo Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Bolo style bracelet with birthstones, not photo engraving; some similarity in personalized jewelry but different customization.
Engraved cuff from a brand known for personalized photo products; similar engraving concept though cuff style differs.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sterling Silver Photo Rope-Edge Bolo Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Photo engraved bracelet with adjustable bolo style; similar in photo engraving and adjustable fit concept.
Corded bracelet featuring personalized photo projection, very close in function and personalization features to the reference.
Custom bracelet with photo projection engraving; highly relevant in personalized photo bracelet category.
Similar to the above, personalized photo projection bracelet closely matches the reference productâ€™s customization and style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Custom Photo Heart Photo Projection Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Custom photo heart projection bracelet; very close in product type, personalization, and likely silhouette and construction.
